Summary: Red chevron above our house in sky large and high up; green oval orb at eye level small, tennis ball size
divs: sighting detailsi want to start by saying that we also witnessed some of the flashing lights described in other report for 7\12\06 at sunset beach, but we did not consider these much because thought they must be military plane formations. i (37 years old) was sitting on the porch at sunset beach looking to the west over the bay towards the mainland. i was sitting with my husband, sister and 67 year old mother. around 10:15 pm i looked straight up into the night sky and saw a red chevron shape floating directly above us, there were about 8 circular red "lights" glowing on the bottom of it. i'm not sure about height but image at least 600 feet up, my husband says 1000+. there was no sound and we watched the object for 2-3 minutes. it swayed slightly in the air as we watched, so that i said it must be a kite. everyone else said it was far too high up for that, plus it was clearly glowing bright red. eventually the object swept north slightly, disappeared behind a cloud and was gone. the strangest part of the experience happened next. a glowing green orb, about the size of a tennis ball, but more oval or cigar shaped dropped down from the height of our house and hit the water in front of us at the end of our pier. instead of sinking, the object bounced off the water about 20 feet in the air and continued skimming and "bouncing" across the sound in a straight line. we watched it for about 10 minutes bouncing through the salt marsh far to the west and we could see the light still as it appeared to rise up and pass over the treeline on the far horizon (a number of miles away). we were completely confounded by this because we all saw the object clearly and could not imagine anything to explain it. the object did not make any sound, glowed bright flourescent green, and traveled in a gentle but directed arcing motion bouncing all the way across the sound in the direction that the red chevron disappeared. even if the red chevron could be explained by weather balloon or plane, cannot figure out about this green object. we sat talking about it for hours because we had all seen the objects so clearly and were absolutely confounded by it. we thought of going around to ask the neighbors if they saw it, but no one was out on their porches near us. we have been thinking about it and discussing it since. very very very strange. none of us have ever had a similar experience before.
